item.title: 1987 Honda CH 150
item.description: I have a 1987 Honda Elite 150 (CH 150) moped that I love to cruise around on. I struggled to find a service manual online. So I bought a copy on Ebay and scaned all of the pages. I then ran it through OCRmyPDF to make it easier to search. That PDF can be downloaded here. If you want the raw scanned pdf it can be downloaded here. Hopefully by sharing it here I can help someone else.
